metadata.name: Tower of Giraffes
metadata.description:
Look at the world, look at the things in a way that no one does. That's how we can love the beauty of everything even shapes. 

Animal : Giraffe

OPI moire illusion living the life of a circle which has a never ending point , and revolution is often termed to Re-evolution which depicts the birth and death of any life form.

Combination of Optical illusion, Demoire and spirograph artstyle.
